channel.title: The Zadek Zone with Bob Zadek
channel.description:
The Zadek Zone hosted by Bob Zadek comes to you from Sausalito, Marin County, just north of the Golden Gate, in California.
Hot issues, fearless commentary, unique insight from historic Sausalito.
channel.itunes:author: Radio Sausalito
channel.itunes:subtitle: The Zadek Zone with Bob Zadek
channel.itunes:summary:
The Zadek Zone hosted by Bob Zadek comes to you from Sausalito, Marin County, just north of the Golden Gate, in California.
Hot issues, fearless commentary, unique insight from historic Sausalito.
channel.itunes:link: The Zadek Zone with Bob Zadek

item.title: Radio Sausalito Election Special 2009 - Interview with Buddy DeBruyn
item.description: Bob Zadek interviews Carolyn Ford, candidate for Sausalito City Council. Are we handling the bike issue properly? If not, what would you do to change that? Are the city's finances in good order?. If not, would you increase income (better known as fees and taxes) or decrease expenses. Please be specific. What is your vision for Marinship? Please be as specific as you can. Do we have enough land dedicated to parks, or would you increase it? As you know, any increase in park land has a cost, since the land is no longer producing tax revenue. "Development" is a hot button word in town. What does that word mean to you. Applying your definition, identify one development project, actual or planned which you endorse and one which you oppose, and why? What level of loyalty do you owe to those who have supported your candidacy? What is the one quality of life in our town which you wish were different? Comment on the city's consideration of the use of eminent domain regarding the Gossage property.
item.itunes:author: Radio Sausalito
item.itunes:subtitle: Radio Sausalito Election Special 2009 - Interview with Buddy DeBruyn

item.title: The Zadek Zone - Show 74 - The Sausalito Bike Problem
item.description: Sausalito has been making headlines in the papers recently for conflicting opinions about the "problem" of cyclists in town. Bob weighs in with some timely and poignant observations.
item.itunes:author: Radio Sausalito
item.itunes:subtitle: The Zadek Zone - Show 74 - The Sausalito Bike Problem
item.itunes:summary: Sausalito has been making headlines in the papers recently for conflicting opinions about the "problem" of cyclists in town. Bob weighs in with some timely and poignant observations.
item.itunes:keywords: The Zadek Zone - Show 74 - The Sausalito Bike Problem

item.title: The Zadek Zone - Show 73 - Cal Budget Deal
item.description: Bob has some unique insight on this weeks California State budget and how governments (including Sausalito) could save lots of money.
item.itunes:author: Radio Sausalito
item.itunes:subtitle: The Zadek Zone - Show 73 - Cal Budget Deal
item.itunes:summary: Bob has some unique insight on this weeks California State budget and how governments (including Sausalito) could save lots of money.
item.itunes:keywords: The Zadek Zone - Show 73 - Cal Budget Deal

item.title: The Zadek Zone - Show 72 - Gossage Marina
item.description: In a few days, the Mayor of Sausalito will have a chance to purchase waterfront land at below market value. In American history, this has been a popular move. Will they pull it off?
item.itunes:author: Radio Sausalito
item.itunes:subtitle: The Zadek Zone - Show 72 - Gossage Marina
